name: Ride on GyrosCopter
description:
Ride on GyrosCopter is the shooting game which controls a helicopter by gyroscope and accelerometer.
Raid and destroy 6 factories / oil fields of the enemy.

[The feature]
- Graphics and sounds are based on 8-bit game machine.
- Effects are rendered by point particles and these shadows.
- Terrain is generated by fractal algorithm in every play.

[Controls]
Device rotate: Control the view and control rotation of the helicopter.
Lower right button: Revolve the rotors and fly up.
Lower center button: Drop a bomb.
Lower right button: Fire the vulcan.
Screen touching: Pause / Resume

[About supplement of bombs]
Helicopter can stock 9 bombs.
Landing at the aircraft carrier, bombs are replenished.
And damage of the aircraft carrier is repaired.
